note.p: Clergyman. BA, Trinity College, Dublin, 1859; MA, 1863. Admitted comitatis causa, Oxford, 1864. Ordained deacon, 1864; priest, 1860. Appointed curate of St Mary’s, Haggerston, London, 1864. Curate of Down, 30 August 1868 to 4 February 1869. Appointed curate of Brasted, Kent, 1869. Curate of Lynsted near Sittingbourne, Kent, 1872–4. Appointed curate of Blisworth, Northants, 1876. Emigrated to Australia circa 1882.
Census returns of England and Wales 1871 (The National Archives: Public Record Office RG10/924/6/4)
